text: The Bad Girls Club season 2 is the second season of The Bad Girls Club. It aired on Oxygen on December 4, 2007. == About this season == Season 2 had an average of 600,000 viewers per episode. The first season had 330,000 viewers per episode. The second season reunion was hosted by Star Jones. After the show, Tanisha Thomas became the host for Love Games: Bad Girls Need Love Too. She also had done a lot of talk shows. She is regarded as the "godmother of the Bad Girls". She also had done two talk shows for the Bad Girls Club. She later married in early 2011. Hanna started acting on broadway after the show. This was the last time 30 minute episodes would air. == Cast members == Name Location Age http://bad-girls-club.oxygen.com/meet-the-cast-bgc Cordelia Carlisle Wallingford, CT 22 Darlen Escobar Austin, TX 24 Hanna Thompson Brooklyn, NY 22 Jennavecia Russo Las Vegas, NV 26 Melissa "Lyric" Greene Phoenix, AZ 22 Neveen Ismail Portland, OR 24 Tanisha Thomas Brooklyn, NY 21 === Replacements === Name Location Replaced Age Andrea Sharples Portland, OR Lyric 22 == References == Category:2007 in American television Category:2007 television seasons Category:2008 in American television Category:2008 television seasons 2
title: The Bad Girls Club (season 2)
